subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Anderson Varejão did not miss a shot and scored 17 points in the first half Friday night as the Cavaliers won their seventh straight, 97-73 over the Indiana Pacers.
snippet: Anderson Varejão did not miss a shot and scored 17 points in the first half Friday night as the Cavaliers won their seventh straight, 97-73 over the Indiana Pacers.
